title: MCP Focus/Select Control
description: Add MCP tools for explicit focus/selection control: ccmux_select_pane, ccmux_select_window, ccmux_select_session. Also change ccmux_create_pane to NOT auto-switch focus by default, with an optional 'select' parameter to opt-in.
user_impact: Enables LLMs to control terminal navigation explicitly, and prevents unwanted focus switches when creating panes programmatically. Critical for multi-pane orchestration workflows.
